frontmatter.title: Learning Android Development the hard way
frontmatter.description: Below are some of the tips that I have learnt about Android Development over the last few years. Have a look, they might help you as well to become a better Android Developer.

frontmatter.title: A quick intro to Dependency Injection what it is, and when to use it
frontmatter.description: Dependency Injection is a topic which is a bit complicated to understand for a fresher but at the same time it's important since it's being used quite widely in software development. In this post, I try to simplify it as much as possible.
